title: Multi-Language addon
content:
Hi all,

I'm looking for an addon for multi-language environment. Many times I'm starting to write only to find out that I was on the wrong language. Checking the current language near the clock is annoying, so I'm looking for something that will indicate the current language I'm on before writing. Thanks.
creator: quizhead

title: uBlock Origin
content: Acting on advice provided by the Computer Active magazine I have installed uBlock Origin in order to block adverts. I was advised to stop using Adblock Plus. Adblock plus had an icon which I could click to see if it was working. uBlock Origin doesn't seem to have any visible icon. The add ons manager indicates that uBlock Origin is the only enabled extension, but is it doing any advert blocking? Shouldn't there be a clickable icon?
creator: Jacklx

title: Possible browser hyjack
content: In Firefox, when I type 'news' into google instead of getting a list of links it takes me straight to the Financial Times website. Is this an issue with google or is Firefox being hyjacked?

title: can't access my e-mails on Comcast
content: Can't access my e-mails on comcast/xfinity..get error message " SEC error Revoked Certificate (Firefox)"..&..."idm.xfinity.com Peers certificate has been revoked...",,contacted Xfinity after 20 minutes they told me to contact my computer mfr HP..I did....signed up for tech service...they spent 1 1/2 hrs.. trying to fix problem get a fix that worked for 1 day...doesn't work any more... need to access emails..am 89 yrs old...not a computer person...need these e-mail contacts to maintain my basic needs....is there anybody out there to help.? can't get an email response... is there a telepone # to call? my tel number is 415 527 8430....thanks

title: Website Inconsistently Loading on Firefox but Works on Safari
content:
Hello everyone,

I've been facing an issue with my website on Firefox. Sometimes it loads properly, but at other times, it's down. However, when I try accessing the website using Safari, it works perfectly.

1. Has anyone experienced something similar? 2. Are there known compatibility issues with Firefox that I should be aware of? 3. Any suggestions on how to troubleshoot this issue?

Thank you in advance for your assistance!
creator: bikevelasocial

title: Firefox Printing Issues
content:
Firefox seems to be adding invisible margins to the sides of pages which is squashing the columns when I try to print as well as "simplifying" pages by "removing unwanted elements" that I very much want to keep.

I've gone through about:config and made sure that... print.use_simplify_page is false. all print_edge instances are set to 0. all print_margin instances are set to 0.

For comparison, the top image is from Chrome, the bottom from Firefox.

Is there a setting I'm missing somewhere? How do I fix this?

title: When I Auto-fill my address, the Country tab is always incorrect
content: I recently filled out my address information into the Forms and Autofill section of settings. I selected United States as my country. But when I use the auto-fill on websites, the country is never correctly filled. It has filled to a couple different countries, never the united states.
creator: mcwroxusa

title: Tôi không thể truy cập vào gmail để kiểm tra khi dùng Mozilla Firefox
content:
Tôi không thể truy cập vào Gmail để kiểm tra khi dùng Mozilla Firefox? Khi truy cập vào Gmail thì chỉ hiện trang có thông báo như sau: "Không kết nối: Sự cố bảo mật tiềm ẩn

Firefox phát hiện một mối đe dọa bảo mật tiềm năng và không tiếp tục đến mail.google.com vì trang web này yêu cầu kết nối an toàn.

Bạn có thể làm gì về nó?

mail.google.com có chính sách bảo mật được gọi là HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS), có nghĩa là Firefox chỉ có thể kết nối với nó một cách an toàn. Bạn không thể thêm ngoại lệ để truy cập trang web này.

Vấn đề rất có thể xảy ra với trang web và bạn không thể làm gì để giải quyết nó.

Nếu bạn đang sử dụng mạng công ty hoặc sử dụng phần mềm chống vi-rút, bạn có thể liên hệ với nhóm hỗ trợ để được trợ giúp. Bạn cũng có thể thông báo cho quản trị viên của trang web về sự cố.

Tìm hiểu thêm…" Tôi không biết phải làm sao để vào Gmail để nhận và trả lời email trên Mozilla Firfox. Mong mọi người hướng dẫn để tôi có thể sử dụng Mozilla Firefox truy cập Gmail. Xin trân thành cảm ơn!
creator: chothuexehaiphong

title: How to keep a pinned page as Homepage
content:
Lets say I have xyz.abc as a pinned page, now when I keep xyz.abc as homepage in settings, on reopening the browser it opens a new tab rather than the one that I have Pinned.

How do i make it so that it doesn't open a new page rather directs me to the pinned page when I open ze browser.
creator: Hitlers_Top_Guy

title: How to keep my login cookies but have a setting set so if/when I open and then close a tab its cookies are deleted
content:
I have seen the setting to delete cookies when I close tabs and tried it.

It causes more problems than it solves.

I may be doing something wrong though.

Scenario: (bigger picture - longer story) I have a lot of windows and tabs open. I am logged into a lot of places.

I am looking for how I can open new windows/tabs and when I close THEM THEIR cookies are deleted. NOT the ones from other windows/tabs.

Selecting the `delete cookies when I close tabs` works, but each time I load Firefox I have to log back into a lot of things. So - to me - that isn't doing what I want.

I will accept that cookies I have. I want any NEW ONES I get from windows/tabs I open to be deleted when I close those windows.

Is this possible?

Thanks in advance.
creator: teeny_weeny
